The Vault

Using Obsidian has completely changed the way I view notetaking and learning. It's not solely because of obsidian, but the app also introduced the idea of a **Second Brain** method for *knowledge management*. I've attempted--and actively attempting--to fully adhere to this approach by turning obsidian into an all-in-one (AIO) productivity & electric journal. !!!!!!
